long_description: From driving long distances to chilling long hours at the beach, the men's Smith Edgewood Sunglasses protect your eyes and add style with a classic, square silhouette. Carbonic TLT lenses are highly impact resistant and block 100% of harmful UVA and UVB rays. Matte Fatigue and Impossibly Black frames have Blackout lenses; Matte Black frames have Red Sol-X lenses. Tortoise frames have brown lenses; Tan Crystal frames have green lenses. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Smith Edgewood Sunglasses for men provide a medium fit with large coverage.
short_description: From driving long distances to chilling long hours at the beach, the men's Smith Edgewood Sunglasses protect your eyes and add style with a classic, square silhouette.
